mapper.select:
select StgId,grade,pumpPrice,notPumpPrice,towerCranePrice,PriceDifference from SM_GradePriceInfo where compid =#{compid} and RecStatus =1
and stgId like '%'+#{stgId}+'%'
and grade like '%'+#{grade}+'%'
mapper.update: update SM_GradePriceInfo set Grade=#{grade} , PumpPrice=#{pumpPrice} , NotPumpPrice=#{notPumpPrice}, TowerCranePrice=#{towerCranePrice}, UpDownMark=0 where compid=#{compid} and StgId=#{stgId}
mapper.insert: insert into SM_GradePriceInfo(compid, StgId, Grade, PumpPrice, NotPumpPrice, TowerCranePrice) values (#{compid},#{stgId},#{grade},#{pumpPrice},#{notPumpPrice},#{towerCranePrice})
